quotes.quote: you do not find the happy life ,you must make it
quotes.author: camila eyring kimball

quotes.quote: sometime you will never know the value of a moment ,until it becomes a memory
quotes.author: dr. seuss

quotes.quote: if you find someone you love in your life , then hang on to that love
quotes.author: prience diana

quotes.quote: “Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: “A room without books is like a body without a soul.”
quotes.author: ― Marcus Tullius Cicero
